headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Climb Amid Mixed Manufacturing, Housing Signals
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Dec, 16 2025 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with contracts tied to the S&P 500 up about half a percent, as investors weigh a mixed batch of global growth signals. In the US, the NY Empire State Manufacturing Index slipped back to minus 3.9 in December, meaning factories in that region are shrinking again and hinting that parts of the economy are losing momentum. Balancing that, a key home builder confidence gauge ticked...
